root.name: save()
root.description: Saves an image from the display window. Images are saved in TIFF or TARGA format depending on the extension of the filename parameter. If no extension is included in the filename, the image will save in TIFF format and .tif will be added to the name. Images are saved to to the "current" folder. For example, when running your sketch from the Processing application, the image will be saved to the location of the Processing application. To save inside the current sketch's folder, use saveFrame(). It is not possible to use save() while running the program in a web browser.

parameter.label: filename
parameter.description: String: any sequence of letters and numbers
